RAMED.name: Free Healthcare (RAMED)
RAMED.description: Government-provided free healthcare for low-income families
RAMED.eligibility: Household income less than 5,600 MAD/month per member
RAMED.application: Visit nearest health center with proof of income, residence certificate, and family documents
RAMED.benefits: Free consultations, medications, hospitalizations at public facilities

Tayssir.name: Education Support (Tayssir)
Tayssir.description: Financial support for families to keep children in school
Tayssir.eligibility: Children in public schools, low-income families in rural and urban areas
Tayssir.amount: 60-140 MAD/month per child depending on grade level
Tayssir.application: Through school administration with proof of enrollment
